Compliance & Legal

Our commitment to operating a safe, legal, and respectful platform.

Content & Safety Policy

Our platform is designed to be a safe and family-friendly resource. We employ automated scripts to filter content based on keywords associated with Not-Safe-For-Work (NSFW) material. This includes, but is not limited to, terms related to explicit, adult, or violent content.

  • Automated Filtering: Our scripts identify and exclude models tagged with or containing descriptions related to NSFW, explicit, or adult themes.
  • No Hosting: We do not host any models or images directly; we only link to publicly available resources on platforms like Hugging Face, GitHub, and Civitai.
  • Best-Effort Basis: While we strive for accuracy, automated filtering may not be perfect. We are continually improving our algorithms.

Reporting & Takedown

We respect the intellectual property rights of others. If you believe that any link on our site points to material that infringes on your copyright, please contact us. To file a DMCA notice, please send an email to compliance@free2aitools.com with the following information:

  • A physical or electronic signature of the copyright owner or a person authorized to act on their behalf.
  • Identification of the copyrighted work claimed to have been infringed.
  • Identification of the link or material on our site that is claimed to be infringing and that is to be removed.
  • Your contact information, including your address, telephone number, and an email address.
  • A statement that you have a good faith belief that use of the material in the manner complained of is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.
  • A statement that the information in the notification is accurate, and, under penalty of perjury, that you are authorized to act on behalf of the copyright owner.

Upon receipt of a valid DMCA notice, we will promptly investigate and remove the infringing link(s) from our index.

For other safety concerns, the most effective way to report an issue is by creating an issue on our official GitHub repository.

Contact Us

For any compliance, safety, or data privacy inquiries, please do not hesitate to contact us directly via email.

Email: compliance@free2aitools.com
